oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of Capt. Alfred T. Donnelly. Co. D, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite of Capt. Alfred T. Donnelly, Co. D, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. Alfred Taylor Donnelly was born on March 9, 1838, in Mountain City, Tennessee. Donnelly was educated at Taylorsville Academy at Boone's Creek in Washington County. Prior to joining the 13th Tenn. in Sept. 1863, he studied law. He mustered out on September 5, 1865, and was admitted to the bar. He died on June 8, 1914, and is buried in the Donnelly Cemetery. He wears a star and saber badge as also seen on cart005.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Donnelly, Alfred T.
